ValidationRule.description: When the Lead Source is marketing related and the Business Segment equals Salesforce, Channel Rep is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Digital Marketing"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Hosted Event"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Sponsored Event"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Website Conversion"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Direct Inbound"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "AppExchange"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Channel Inbound") ), ISPICKVAL(Business_Segment__c, "Salesforce"), ISBLANK(Channel_Rep__c), CloseDate>=DATE(2019,10,01),
OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName , "4 Proposal" ), ISPICKVAL(StageName , "5 Agreements Delivered" ), ISPICKVAL(StageName , "6 Negotiating" ), ISPICKVAL(StageName , "7 Verbal Agreement" ), ISPICKVAL(StageName , "8 Closed Won" ) ) ) && $Profile.Name != "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name != "7S System Admin"
